subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Indians, American
Mascots
lead_paragraph: Vernon Bellecourt, an Ojibwa Indian who waged a long campaign for native rights, was most visible in battling the use of Indian nicknames by sports teams.
snippet: Vernon Bellecourt, an Ojibwa Indian who waged a long campaign for native rights, was most visible in battling the use of Indian nicknames by sports teams.
